title: Nigeria's NNPC hopes to raise oil output to about 3 mln bpd in 2-3 yrs
text:
Nigeria's NNPC hopes to raise oil output to about 3 mln bpd in 2-3 yrs

Commodities 3 hours ago (Oct 01, 2019 08:40)

© Reuters. Nigeria's NNPC hopes to raise oil output to about 3 mln bpd in 2-3 yrs FUJAIRAH, Oct 1 (Reuters) - Nigeria's state oil company hopes to raise oil production to about 3 million barrels per day in the next 2-3 years, its managing director said on Tuesday. Nigerian National Petroleum Corporation's (NNPC) Mele Kolo Kyari was speaking at an industry conference in Fujairah in the

Nigeria's NNPC hopes to raise oil output to about 3 mln bpd in 2-3 yrs
